pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Stats of R Packages // Monthly download stats of 'CRAN' and 'Bioconductor' packages. Download stats of 'CRAN' packages is from the 'RStudio' 'CRAN mirror', see https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org:443. 'Bioconductor' package download stats is at https://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/.
